did.unittitle: Plan of Battle of Manasas or Bull Run Sunday July 21st 1861 from sketches on the spot by F. C. DeLamar
did.abstract: Manuscript map of the battlefield at Manassas (Bull Run), Va. It is unclear whether DeLamar made the map as well as the sketches upon which it was based.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: The copyright interests in this collection have not been transferred to Duke University. For more information, consult the copyright section of the Regulations and Procedures of the David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library.

prefercite.p: Plan of Battle of Manasas or Bull Run Sunday July 21st 1861 from sketches on the spot by F. C. DeLamar, 1861, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.p: This finding aid was derived from a MARC record using a crosswalk defined in marc2ead_sectionA.xsl. The finding aid was generated as part of a larger project to digitize several thousand small collections housed in Section A, September 2018.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Manuscript map of the battlefield at Manassas (Bull Run), Va. It is unclear whether DeLamar made the map as well as the sketches upon which it was based.
